title: Rear Brake Caliper - Inspection

body.body: Always renew caliper seals and pistons after removal from the caliper. An effective hydraulic seal can only be made if new components are used.
A dangerous riding condition leading to loss of control of the motorcycle or an accident could result if this warning is ignored.

Check the pistons, caliper, mounting bracket and mounting bracket sliding pin gaiters for signs of damage, paying particular attention to the caliper bores and pistons. If damage is present, renew the worn component or the complete caliper assembly.
